thread.section_title: 12 soap spoiler pictures: EastEnders attack, Coronation Street tragedy, Emmerdale trial, Hollyoaks robbery – Metro
thread.title: 12 soap spoiler pictures: EastEnders attack, Coronation Street tragedy, Emmerdale trial, Hollyoaks robbery
thread.title_full: 12 soap spoiler pictures: EastEnders attack, Coronation Street tragedy, Emmerdale trial, Hollyoaks robbery

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: 12 soap spoiler pictures: EastEnders attack, Coronation Street tragedy, Emmerdale trial, Hollyoaks robbery
text:
(Picture: ITV/BBC/Lime Pictures) 2017 is underway and already the soaps are hitting us with as much misery as they can pile on. As Coronation Street airs a devastating tragedy for Michelle Connor and Steve McDonald, the aftermath of Lee Carter’s actions brings new turmoil for his family as Mick struggles to cope. 
Meanwhile, a robbery in Hollyoaks could have devastating consequences while Cain Dingle is heading for a meltdown that could see him lose Kyle in Emmerdale.
We have rounded up the latest pictures of all of the new soap action coming to a screen near you:
EastEnders (Picture: BBC) Oh Aunt Babe, those are some sour chops, aren’t they!? The schemer is fuming when she seems to be in the bad books of the Carter family again – not least of all because she lashes out at Whitney and blames her for the situation Lee found himself in. Mick warns Aunt Babe that she is on her last warning – and this time, he really seems to mean it…
(Picture: BBC) Denise goes into labour but still seems set on giving her baby up. Meanwhile, her daddy secret is at risk when Shirley confronts her over the father’s identity after suspecting that it may be Buster. But will the truth emerge?
(Picture: BBC) Still estranged from Shakil, Bex has some decisions to make about where her future lies and when one of Shakil’s mates winds her up by implying that he will have lots of fun with girls at sixth form, she makes a big decision. Will she stick around or move away to attend college?
Coronation Street (Picture: ITV) Life takes a devastating turn for Steve and Michelle when she goes into early labour and loses the baby in a tragic late miscarriage. As Steve and Michelle say their painful goodbyes to baby Ruairi, can they hold everything together or will the torment of what has happened to them tear them apart?
(Picture: ITV) Peter and Toyah’s illicit secret heads closer to exposure when Simon confides in Eva what he knows about what they have been up to. Eva is on the warpath but she spies an opportunity to help Aidan as she threatens to reveal the affair…
(Picture: ITV) Phelan utilises an out of depth Andy to steal Kevin’s pickup truck but when Kevin installs new CCTV following the theft, it picks up a conversation between Phelan and Todd about the property scam. Is Phelan finally about to be busted?
Hollyoaks (Picture: Lime Pictures) Things appear to be developing further between Nathan and Cleo as he organises a cosy film night for her on the Love Boat. As Lisa clocks their closeness, she has words of warning for Cleo and urges Nathan to make his decision.
(Picture: Lime Pictures) Later, he appears to pay the price when he is caught up in a robbery at the bar. As intruders leave Nathan out cold, Lisa and Mac are locked in the cellar together – might they be tempted for round two following their recent liaison?
(Picture: Lime Pictures) Ste is delighted when Ryan brings Leah to his birthday party but the overall tension remains, particularly when Amy is reported to social services and Ryan vows to find out who was behind it…
Emmerdale (Picture: ITV) It’s the day of Lachlan’s trial and as Chrissie waits for the results, Ronnie tries to stop Lawrence from attending and taking the blame by locking him in at Home Farm. But when Lawrence appears to have a heart attack, there could be tragic consequences…
(Picture: ITV) Volatile Cain struggles to cope with Kyle and when the lad is stubborn with him, Cain’s temper flares and he shocks himself by raising a fist. The outburst makes him reconsider what is best for Kyle and he comes to a big decision.
(Picture: ITV) Rhona is uncomfortable when she is pulled into the Woolpack Hunk Night for a dance with one of the performers and with Pierce already fuming that she is ignoring his calls, how will he react when he walks in on this?
